system.description: Topaz is a gemstone that can appear in golden-yellow or light blue colors. It has a smooth, polished surface with a brilliant, faceted appearance, showcasing its clarity and reflective properties. Topaz is prized for its vibrant hue and sparkling brilliance, making it a popular choice in jewelry.
